successes.title: DreadBall - The Futuristic Sports Game
successes.description: DreadBall – The Futuristic Sports Game - fantastic miniatures, great game mechanics and amazing sci-fi imagery - it ends today!

Pledges.description: Visitor – a digital copy of the DreadBall rules.
Guard – a team of your choice + a digital copy of the DreadBall rules.
Keeper – a copy of DreadBall – The Futuristic Sports Game + a print of the cover art + a digital copy of the rules. Free shipping to the US and UK – please add $15 to everywhere else.

Jack – a copy of DreadBall – The Futuristic Sports Game + Lucky Logan + Slippery Joe + a signed print of the cover art + a digital copy of the rules + your name listed as a supporter in the DreadBall Fanzone. Free shipping to the US and UK – please add $15 to everywhere else.

Jack – a copy of DreadBall – The Futuristic Sports Game + Lucky Logan + Slippery Joe + a signed print of the cover art + a digital copy of the rules + your name listed as a supporter in the DreadBall Fanzone. Free shipping to the US and UK – please add $15 to everywhere else.

Striker! Early Bird Special – limited to 100! – a copy of DreadBall – The Futuristic Sports Game + Midgard Delvers team + Skittersneak Stealers team + Lucky Logan + Slippery Joe + a signed print of the cover art + digital copy of the rules + digital “Creating DreadBall” book + your name listed as a supporter in the DreadBall Fanzone. Free shipping to the US and UK – please add $15 to everywhere else.

Striker! – a copy of DreadBall – The Futuristic Sports Game + Midgard Delvers team + Skittersneak Stealers team + Lucky Logan + Slippery Joe + a signed print of the cover art + digital copy of the rules + digital “Creating DreadBall” book + your name listed as a supporter in the DreadBall Fanzone. Free shipping to the US and UK – please add $15 to everywhere else.

Striker! – a copy of DreadBall – The Futuristic Sports Game + Midgard Delvers team + Skittersneak Stealers team + Lucky Logan + Slippery Joe + a signed print of the cover art + digital copy of the rules + digital “Creating DreadBall” book + your name listed as a supporter in the DreadBall Fanzone. Free shipping to the US and UK – please add $15 to everywhere else.
Cheerleader Early Bird Special – 2 x Striker! Two of everything from Striker! Free shipping to the US and UK – please add $15 to everywhere else.
Cheerleader – 2 x Striker! Two of everything from Striker! Free shipping to the US and UK – please add $15 to everywhere else.

Championship Venue Bundle - A fantastic launch pack for your store which includes multiple copies of game, teams and a special demo gameboard, for those venues out there who want to play their demo games on the best pitch available, all at your usual discount! You will also be listed as a venue in the Fanzone on the DreadBall website. This reward is only available to traders - for full details, including shipping rates, please contact your Mantic Trade Rep (See FAQ for contact details).
Showboater Early Bird Special – 3 x Striker! Three of everything from Striker! Includes free courier shipping to the US and UK – please add $25 to everywhere else.
Showboater – 3 x Striker! Three of everything from Striker! Includes free courier shipping to the US and UK – please add $25 to everywhere else.

World Series Venue Bundle – An amazing Bumper Launch pack for your store that includes multiple copies of game, teams and MVPs, all at your usual discount! Also included is a Premium Demo Hex-board, custom etched with your store name, for those venues out there who want to play their demo games on the very best pitch possible! You will also be listed as a World Series Venue in the Fanzone on the DreadBall website. This reward is only available to traders - for full details, including shipping rates, please contact your Mantic Trade Rep (See FAQ for contact details).

League Sponsor – 6 x Striker! Six of everything from Striker! + large league poster and promotions pack (including trophy set). Includes free courier shipping to the US and UK – please add $25 to everywhere else.
Team Colors – Everything in Striker! painted by Golem Painting Studio. Includes free courier shipping to the US and UK – please add $25 to everywhere else.
Team Colors Revisited! – Same as Team Colors - get everything in Striker! painted by Golem Painting Studio! Includes free courier shipping to the US and UK – please add $25 to everywhere else.
Team Colors Unlimited! – get everything in the bumper Striker! pack painted by Golem Painting Studio! Includes free courier shipping to the US and UK – please add $25 to everywhere else.
Team Colors Unleashed! – Golem have agreed to paint 3 more Strikers! Includes free courier shipping to the US and UK – please add $25 to everywhere else.

Free Agent - Everything in Striker! painted by Golem Painting Studio + be involved in creating and designing a new MVP that will be named in your honor + get a rare resin master of the MVP painted by Golem + Custom Acrylic Pitch + DreadBall Battle Foam Bag + invitation to a VIP coaching session from Ronnie or Jake. Includes free courier shipping to the US and UK – please add $25 to everywhere else.

Most Valuable Player – All future releases for DreadBall for 3 years. Everything in Striker! painted by Golem Painting Studio + get yourself sculpted as a new MVP that will be named in your honor + get a rare resin master of the MVP painted by Golem + one-off custom etched/coloured Acrylic Pitch and counters + DreadBall Battle Foam Bag + invitation for VIP coaching from Ronnie or Jake. Includes free courier shipping to the US and UK – please add $25 to everywhere else.

Head Coach – All future releases for DreadBall for 3 years. Everything in Striker! painted by Golem Painting Studio + get yourself sculpted as a new MVP that will be named in your honor + get a rare resin master of the MVP painted by Golem + one-off custom etched/coloured Acrylic Pitch and counters + DreadBall Battle Foam Bag + invitation for VIP coaching from Ronnie or Jake. Includes free courier shipping to the US and UK – please add $25 to everywhere else.

Man of the Match – Be immortalized as the cover art for DreadBall Season 2 and get all future releases for DreadBall for 3 years. Get an exclusive copy of DreadBall – the Futuristic Sports Game in master resin and everything in Striker! painted by Golem Painting Studio + get yourself sculpted as a new MVP that will be named in your honor + get a rare resin master of the MVP painted by Golem + one-off custom etched/coloured Acrylic Pitch and counter set + DreadBall Battle Foam Bag + invitation to a VIP coaching session from Ronnie or Jake. Includes free courier shipping to the US and UK - please add $25 to everywhere else.
